name: Custom Sounds
author: Ducko
description: Allows replacing Discord sounds with your own custom uploaded sounds

name: Discord Debug
author: Ducko
description: Setting option with debug information about Discord

name: Egg Scrambler
author: Fjorge + Hax + Ducko
description: Makes discord unusable by converting all messages into eggs

name: (E x p a n d)Cord
author: Fjorge + Ducko
description: M a k e s  d i s c o r d  w i d e

name: Message Scrambler
author: Fjorge
description: Makes discord unusable by converting all messages into random text

name: No Message Deletion
author: Ducko
description: Messages only turn red instead of completely disappearing (only current visible messages)

name: Role Colored Messages
author: Ducko
description: Makes message text color the same as the sender's role color

name: Twitch Emotes
author: Ducko
description: Converts text into images for Twitch global emotes + BetterTTV emotes

name: WYSIWYG Messages
author: Ducko
description: Makes messages WGSIWYG-like (like in the message sending box)

name: Clear Recent Games
author: Ducko
description: Adds setting button which clears recent games (in "Game Activity")

name: Game Activity Button
author: Ducko
description: Adds button to account panel which enables / disables game activity (showing what game you are playing), idea and icon from Egrodo's BD plugin

name: Nickname Panel
author: Ducko
description: Shows nickname in account panel instead of username (but still username on hover), idea based on Zerebos' BD plugin "AccountDetailsPlus"

name: VC Columns
author: Ducko
description: A column UI with larger buttons for VC

name: Visual Tweaks
author: Ducko + Fjorge
description: A variety of visual tweaks, including themes and small changes
